Detailed Description

The position of the indicator depends on the alignment. Smaller positions are more left than higher positions. Position 0 indicates the point of the alignment, i.e. an indicator aligned to Center with position 0 will stay in the absolute center of the indicator bar. Therefor positions less than 0 should be used for indicators left to the alignment point, positions larger than 0 should be used for indicator placement right to the alignment point. This involves, that in dicators aligned to Right should be positioned with numbers less than 0 or 0 where position 0 is the most right position.
